title: Vincent Figgins
content:
Designer and Punchcutter  
1766 - 1844

Vincent Figgins is primarily remembered for his work with display types. He introduced the first [egyptian](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809055653/http:/typophile.com/wiki/egyptian) typeface in 1817.

Fonts Designed:  
 [Gresham](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809055653/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Gresham) (1792, re-issued 1925)  
 [Figgins Shaded](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809055653/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Figgins%20Shaded) (1815, re-issued 1937)  
 [Egyptian](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809055653/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Egyptian) (1817)
author: Jared Benson
